channel.title: emr on eks on Amazon EKS Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in emr on eks on Amazon EKS Workshop

item.title: EMR on EKS
item.description: EMR on EKS EMR on EKS is a deployment option in EMR that allows you to automate the provisioning and management of open-source big data frameworks on EKS. There are several advantages of running optimized spark runtime provided by Amazon EMR on EKS such as 3x faster performance, fully managed lifecycle of these jobs, built-in monitoring and logging functionality, integrates securely with Kubernetes and more. Because Kubernetes can natively run Spark jobs, if you use multi-tenant EKS environment (shared with other micro-services), your spark jobs are deployed in seconds vs minutes when compared to EC2 based deployments.
